Budget.name: Budget
Budget.description: Tracks an estimate of future revenue or expenses during a specific time period.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the budget.

Amount.description: The total amount of funds for a budget shown in currency format.

EstimatedUtilizationAmount.description: The amount that's estimated to be utilized from the budget.

Description.description: The description of the budget and its related business processes.

IsSubmitted.description: Indicates whether the budget has been submitted. This field is available from API version 58.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner who owns the record.

ParentBudgetId.description: ID of the associated parent budget.

PeriodEndDate.description: The end of the date range for which the budget applies.

PeriodName.description: The name of the time period to which the budget applies.

PeriodStartDate.description: The beginning of the date range for which the budget applies.

ProgramId.description: The program associated with the budget.

Quantity.description: The quantity used to track a budget for non-currency projects. For example, this could be number of hours or number of resources.

Type.description: Categorizes the budget by how it will be used.

UtilizedAmount.description: The amount that has already been utilized from the budget.
